devdoc.author: LI.FI (https://li.fi)
devdoc.details: Uses calldata to execute APPROVED arbitrary methods on DEXs

params._minAmount: the minimum amount of the final asset to receive
params._receiver: the address to receive the swapped tokens into (also excess tokens)
params._swapData: an object containing swap related data to perform swaps before bridging
params._transactionId: the transaction id associated with the operation

devdoc.title: Generic Swap Facet

swapTokensGeneric(bytes32,string,string,.notice: Performs multiple swaps in one transaction

userdoc.notice: Provides functionality for swapping through ANY APPROVED DEX
